Articles.Content: Nothing major, but i think the current sound tracks are getting a bit repetitive. It's probably because i have been playing for a while but i thought it would be nice to just have some new sound tracks. Nothing that changes the mood but just something different to listen to. Any one else with me?
Bump* Any one else want new music?

I don't remember the last time I actually had the game music on. Turned it off long long ago when it got boring and repetitive. I usually have a movie playing or I'm listening to my own music collection instead anyways...

P.S. It's against the rules to bump your thread...

On that note, I did notice that if you turn the music off there's very few sound effects that don't work any more until you turn the music back up. There's sliders for ambient sounds and stuff, but if music is at 0% you can't hear them.
Apart from engine noises, explosions and parachutes, i don't think there are many more sound effects.
I would defiantly like some more audio input from the game. I've been listening to books whilst I play
